text: South Lawndale, one of Chicago's 77 well-defined community areas, is on the West Side of the city of Chicago, Illinois. Now mainly inhabited by Mexican immigrants, Little Village was originally settled by Eastern European and Czech and Bohemian immigrants in the late 19th century, after the Great Chicago Fire. ==Other websites== *Official City of Chicago South Lawndale Community Map *Enlace Chicago on Facebook *Little Village Chamber of Commerce *La Villita Community on Facebook *La Villita Community on Twitter *Marshall Square Online *Maria Saucedo bio Category:Community areas of Chicago
title: South Lawndale, Chicago
